Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kimball/Altgeld
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Foster and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Kimball/Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Foster and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Kimball/Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kimball/Altgeld
ShortDescription: Southbound 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Kimball/Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Kimball/Altgeld.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Lake
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB California, Washington and Sacramento; SB Sacramento, Warren and California: due to, street blockage near California/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/Lake due to street blockage near California/Lake.

Northbound buses will operate via California, Washington and Sacramento including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Sacramento, Warren and California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose  Eastbound Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Marine Dr
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
